items.title: Raheem Residency
items.summary: A treasure-trove close to the beach, this colonial bungalow once hosted Mahatma Gandhi and Jawaharlal Nehru, and has been lovingly restored.

items.title: Kettuvallam (Houseboat)
items.summary: One of the most tranquil and relaxing things you can do in India is to cruise through the backwaters in a Kerala houseboat, known as a kettuvallam.

items.title: Emerald Isle
items.summary: A wonderful old heritage home on Kerala’s backwaters with a very friendly host who believes passionately in preserving his family’s traditions.
